column4: Hi, If I have several headphone and loudspeakers plugged in, can I decide which that should make the sounds? I'ld be really glad if it got fixed, even if switching meant restarting X each time
[fireman]  try asking #KDE  :), I think they know better
Scorp123 - maybe fireman means that it should mount the CD an play the tracks on it ;)
if he really meant that .... good luck with that :)
